name: Rhythm Journey
description:
A vertical rhythm game created by students in the Game Arts Department.
To operate, simply press the "Notes" that appear from above with the corresponding key at the right time!
Play various songs and difficulty levels and aim for a high score!
The graphics and programs, as well as the music used, are all student originals.
Please play repeatedly and find your favorite songs!

  • Single-player
  • Rhythm game
